name: (Mini) Mini Games
description:
(Mini) Mini Games was made in less than a week for the https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2020

Restriction: Game Must be 64 x 64

All assets, sounds, and code were made during the jam period (apart from basic scripts).

Known Browser Bugs:

BUG: in" Monster UnInc"after the score reaches a certain point the parent wil no longer come in.

BUG: in "Menu" the game crashes if you go left on the title screen.

BUG: in "Hotdog Hostage" sometimes the if you shoot a bad guy a hotdog spawns after right behind, the game counts it as if you shot the hotdog.

The optimal version of this game is the Windows one, the browser version is currently unstable. Fixes are on the way.

Game #1 - Ping

Definitely not a ripoff of the popular ping pong game...

Controls:

  • Move: W S
  • Exit Game: ESC
Game #2 - Hotdog Hostage

Shoot terrorists and avoid hitting hotdogs, it's that easy!

Controls:

  • Shoot: Left MB
  • Exit Game: ESC
Game #3 - Bullet Simulator

Destroy planes and avoid Nokia phones, it's like a reverse SHMUP!

Controls:

  • Move: W A S D
  • Exit Game: ESC
Game #4 - Monsters UnInc

Scare the child without his hotdog parent seeing you!

Controls:

  • Open/Close  Closet : Left MB
  • Exit Game: ESC
